docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Seventh Imports Program :
            Credit 0866 - Development Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Seventh Imports
            Program : Credit 0866 - Development Credit Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!: Bangladesh - Seventh Imports Program Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Seventh Imports Program Credit
            Project will provide foreign exchange for the import of
            industrial components, chemicals, raw materials and spare
            parts to enable selected high priority industries to reach
            their full production potential. In connection with this
            proposed credit, apart from monitoring progress in
            implementing the programs agreed under previous imports
            credits to improve the efficiency and financial viability of
            the jute, cotton textile and paper industries, it is
            proposed to focus on issues relating to export promotion.
